DeleteDeliveryStream.name: DeleteDeliveryStream
DeleteDeliveryStream.description: Deletes a delivery stream and its data.

DescribeDeliveryStream.name: DescribeDeliveryStream
DescribeDeliveryStream.description: Describes the specified delivery stream and gets the status.

ListTagsForDeliveryStream.name: ListTagsForDeliveryStream
ListTagsForDeliveryStream.description: Lists the tags for the specified delivery stream.

PutRecord.name: PutRecord
PutRecord.description: Writes a single data record into an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream.

PutRecordBatch.name: PutRecordBatch
PutRecordBatch.description:
Writes multiple data records into a delivery stream in a single call, which can achieve
                                                higher throughput per producer than when writing single records.

StartDeliveryStreamEncryption.name: StartDeliveryStreamEncryption
StartDeliveryStreamEncryption.description: Enables server-side encryption (SSE) for the delivery stream.

StopDeliveryStreamEncryption.name: StopDeliveryStreamEncryption
StopDeliveryStreamEncryption.description: Disables the specified destination of the specified delivery stream.

TagDeliveryStream.name: TagDeliveryStream
TagDeliveryStream.description: Adds or updates tags for the specified delivery stream.

UntagDeliveryStream.name: UntagDeliveryStream
UntagDeliveryStream.description: Removes tags from the specified delivery stream.

UpdateDestination.name: UpdateDestination
UpdateDestination.description: Updates the specified destination of the specified delivery stream.
